Sale is not totally bad, the parts near Altrincham would be better than areas near Wythenshawe. I have heard quite a few good things about schools in Sale to be fair.
I think for small families it would be nice to live in towns like Cheadle, Bramhall, Heald Green, Wilmslow.

1. Due to time difference, I may not be able to reply asap. Mans got a life to live too. Please be patient.

2. Totally understand the BBC joke, but it’s a 2005 joke made by yall big big 25 adults. I can take a joke but would only laugh if it’s funny.

3. If I read any racist/homophobic/sexist comments, I will call them out and they will also be reported. It may not be a huge problem in HK to make those sort of jokes/comment, but that’s my boundaries.
